t: Good Smile Company US - hobby life, figma, Nendoroid
s: Good Smile Company, also known as GSC or Good Smile, is a Japanese manufacturer of hobby products such as the Nendoroid and figma product lines, as well as scale figures. In addition to production and manufacturing, our business includes design, marketing and distribution.

t: Q: is the good smile company considered chinese or ...
s: I can answer this question. I'm actually the owner of a Good Smile Company partner store owner (Chuck's Anime Shrine). Good Smile Company is a japanese-based company. The popularity of the figures GSC makes unfortunately brings up lots bootlegs posing as real figures.
